<ICNetworkDelegate> Protocol Reference
Networking

The ICNetwork Channel's delegate methods. More...

#import <ICNetwork.h>

Instance Methods

(void) - networkData:incoming:
 Log event handler to be implemented by the delegate of the ICNetwork object. More...
 
(void) - networkWillConnectToHost:onPort:
 Method called when the network channel tries to connect to a remote host. More...
 
(void) - networkDidConnectToHost:onPort:
 Method called when a connection to a remote host is opened. More...
 
(void) - networkFailedToConnectToHost:onPort:
 Method called when the network channel failed to connect to a remote host. More...
 
(void) - networkDidDisconnectFromHost:onPort:
 Method called when the Companion is disconnected from a remote host. More...
 
(void) - networkDidReceiveErrorWithHost:andPort:
 Method called if network errors occur during communication with a remote host. More...
 

Detailed Description

The ICNetwork Channel's delegate methods.

These methods should be implemented by the ICNetwork's delegate to subscribe to its events
